stackOverflowLinks.title: Stack Overflow Results
stackOverflowLinks.description: Number of Stack Overflow links to return (0-50)

googleLinks.title: Google Search Results
googleLinks.description: Number of general Google search links to return (0-50)

translateQuery.title: Translate Query

lingoApiKey.title: Lingo.dev API Key
lingoApiKey.description: Your Lingo.dev API key for translation (or set LINGODOTDEV_API_KEY env var)
